intro.description:
This tutorial guides you through the steps of Turmeric application creation using Turmeric plugin. You will create a Turmeric service, a type library, a comsumer and a error library.
If you need help at any step, click the (?) to the right. Let's get started!

item.title: Open Turmeric Development Perspective
item.description: If you're not already in the Turmeric development perspective, in the main menu select Window > Open Perspective > Turmeric Development or click on the "Click to Perform" link below.

item.title: Create Type Library
item.description: If your service needs a type library, you may need to create a type library project and add types to a type library.

subitem.label: To bring up Type Library creation wizard, you can right click on package explorer, select New-> Type Library or click the link on the right.
To bring up Type creation wizard, you can right click on package explorer, select New -> Schema Type (Type Library) or click the link on the right.

item.title: Create Service
item.description:
Turmeric plugin provides a Service Creation wizard. To bing up this wizard, you can right click on package explorer, select New-> Service (from WSDL) or click on the link below.
This wizard will help you to create a Turmeric Service. Click (?) on the right for more details.

item.title: Create Consumer
item.description:
Turmeric plugin provides a Consumer creation wizard. To bing up this wizard, you can right click on package explorer, select New-> Consumer or click on the link below.
This wizard will help you to create a Turmeric Service Consumer. Click (?) on the right for more details.

item.title: Create Error Library
item.description:
Turmeric plugin provides a Error Library creation wizard. To bing up this wizard, you can right click on package explorer, select New-> Error (Error Library) or click on the link below.
This wizard will help you to create a Turmeric Service Consumer. Click (?) on the right for more details.
